src.sql:
select F.FileName, F.FileId from app.ArticleDocumentFiles ADF
left join app.Article A on A.Id = ADF.ArticleId
inner join dbo.Files F on ADF.DocumentId = F.FileId
left join app.ArticleChangeDocumentFiles ACDF on ACDF.DocumentId = F.FileId
where A.Id = '[TknParams:ArticleId=-1]' or ACDF.ArticleChangeId = '[TknParams:ArticleChangeId=-1]'
